segment.source: How to Use an App-V 4.6 Application From an App-V 5.0 Application
segment.target: How to Use an App-V 4.6 Application From an App-V 5.0 Application

segment.source: How to Use an App-V 4.6 Application From an App-V 5.0 Application
segment.target: How to Use an App-V 4.6 Application From an App-V 5.0 Application

segment.source: How to Use an App-V 4.6 Application From an App-V 5.0 Application
segment.target: How to Use an App-V 4.6 Application From an App-V 5.0 Application

segment.source: Note:* App-V 4.6 has exited Mainstream support.
segment.target: Note:* App-V 4.6 has exited Mainstream support.

segment.source: The following applies to an App-V 4.6 SP3 package.
segment.target: The following applies to an App-V 4.6 SP3 package.

segment.source: Use the following procedure to run an App-V 4.6 application with App-V 5.0 applications on a standalone client.
segment.target: Use the following procedure to run an App-V 4.6 application with App-V 5.0 applications on a standalone client.

segment.source: To run applications on a standalone client
segment.target: To run applications on a standalone client

segment.source: Select two applications in your environment that can be opened from one another.
segment.target: Select two applications in your environment that can be opened from one another.

segment.source: For example, Microsoft Outlook and Adobe Acrobat Reader.
segment.target: For example, Microsoft Outlook and Adobe Acrobat Reader.

segment.source: You can access an email attachment created using Adobe Acrobat.
segment.target: You can access an email attachment created using Adobe Acrobat.

segment.source: Convert the packages, or create a new package for either of the applications using the App-V 5.0 format.
segment.target: Convert the packages, or create a new package for either of the applications using the App-V 5.0 format.

segment.source: For more information about converting packages see, How to Migrate Extension Points From an App-V 4.6 Package to a Converted App-V 5.0 Package for All Users on a Specific Computer or How to Migrate Extension Points From an App-V 4.6 Package to App-V 5.0 for a Specific User.
segment.target: For more information about converting packages see, How to Migrate Extension Points From an App-V 4.6 Package to a Converted App-V 5.0 Package for All Users on a Specific Computer or How to Migrate Extension Points From an App-V 4.6 Package to App-V 5.0 for a Specific User.

segment.source: Add and provision the package using the App-V 5.0 management console.
segment.target: Add and provision the package using the App-V 5.0 management console.

segment.source: For more information adding and provisioning packages see, How to Add or Upgrade Packages by Using the Management Console and How to Configure Access to Packages by Using the Management Console.
segment.target: For more information adding and provisioning packages see, How to Add or Upgrade Packages by Using the Management Console and How to Configure Access to Packages by Using the Management Console.

segment.source: The converted application now runs using App-V 5.0 and you can open one application from the other.
segment.target: The converted application now runs using App-V 5.0 and you can open one application from the other.

segment.source: For example, if you converted a Microsoft Office package to an App-V 5.0 package and Adobe Acrobat is still running as an App-V 4.6 package, you can open an Adobe Acrobat Reader attachment using Microsoft Outlook.
segment.target: For example, if you converted a Microsoft Office package to an App-V 5.0 package and Adobe Acrobat is still running as an App-V 4.6 package, you can open an Adobe Acrobat Reader attachment using Microsoft Outlook.

segment.source: Got a suggestion for App-V?
segment.target: Got a suggestion for App-V?

segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.target: Use the App-V TechNet Forum.
